message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $12,000 to you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a price of $14,000 for this exceptional product. This price not only ensures a fair return on my investment but also leaves room for you to appreciate its true worth without breaking your budget. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.
